body:
Comment 6: 
I just ran w/ Debug=2, GOMAXPROCS=8, no logging to stderr, and see the crash after 3851
requests.

I've attached the stderr output which is just the output from Debug=2. I don't know how
to interpret it. Also attached the gdb output.
Attachments: 1. err.txt (6575094 bytes) 1. gdb.txt (3171 bytes)
